Sentencas: Cermet of Ni-YSZ (yttrium-stabilized zirconia) is commonly used as the anode material of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) and the properties of the NiO-YSZ slurry has a significant effect on the performance of SOFCs prepared by wet processes.
Titulo: Preparation of NiO-YSZ-Graphite Aqueous Slurry and Its Application in Fabricating Solid Oxide Fuel Cells by Slip-Casting

Sentencas: The stability of the NiO-YSZ slurry was investigated through zeta potential analysis.
Titulo: Preparation of NiO-YSZ-Graphite Aqueous Slurry and Its Application in Fabricating Solid Oxide Fuel Cells by Slip-Casting

Sentencas: The effects of six dispersants on the surface zeta potentials of NiO and YSZ were examined.
Titulo: Preparation of NiO-YSZ-Graphite Aqueous Slurry and Its Application in Fabricating Solid Oxide Fuel Cells by Slip-Casting

Sentencas: It was found that the zeta potential of NiO was opposite to that of YSZ when the anionic or amphoteric dispersant existed.
Titulo: Preparation of NiO-YSZ-Graphite Aqueous Slurry and Its Application in Fabricating Solid Oxide Fuel Cells by Slip-Casting

Sentencas: When the cationic dispersant poly(diallyldimethylammonium chloride) (PDAC) was used, the zeta potentials for both NiO and YSZ were positive and they could be simultaneously suspended in water.
Titulo: Preparation of NiO-YSZ-Graphite Aqueous Slurry and Its Application in Fabricating Solid Oxide Fuel Cells by Slip-Casting

Sentencas: By adding graphite, which is used as the pore former when fabricating the SOFC anode, into the NiO-YSZ suspension and using polyvinylpyrrolidone (PVP) as the dispersant of graphite, a stable NiO-YSZ-graphite aqueous slurry was successfully prepared.
Titulo: Preparation of NiO-YSZ-Graphite Aqueous Slurry and Its Application in Fabricating Solid Oxide Fuel Cells by Slip-Casting

Sentencas: The slurry was used to fabricate anode supports for SOFCs with the slip-casting technique.
Titulo: Preparation of NiO-YSZ-Graphite Aqueous Slurry and Its Application in Fabricating Solid Oxide Fuel Cells by Slip-Casting

Sentencas: A typical single anode-supported SOFC showed a maximum power density of 509 mW.cm(-2) at 800 degrees C.
Titulo: Preparation of NiO-YSZ-Graphite Aqueous Slurry and Its Application in Fabricating Solid Oxide Fuel Cells by Slip-Casting

Sentencas: The microstructure of the SOFC with the anode support was examined by scanning electron microscope (SEM) analysis and it was found that the electrolyte and anode bonded well and the pores were homogenously distributed in the anode.
Titulo: Preparation of NiO-YSZ-Graphite Aqueous Slurry and Its Application in Fabricating Solid Oxide Fuel Cells by Slip-Casting
